directions: Whisk together the maple syrup, vegetable oil and sherry vinegar in a large bowl. Add the squash, parsley, dried cherries and sunflower seeds; toss well. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Let sit for 30 minutes at room temperature or 1 hour in the refrigerator before serving.
ingredients: 1 pound butternut squash, peeled, grated on a box grater
Kosher salt and coarsely ground black pepper
title: Butternut Squash Slaw
